column1: Temporal Video Analyzer (TVAN): Efficient Temporal Video Analysis for Robust Video Description and Search
With the increasing popularity of video content
column2: automatic video understanding is becoming more and more important for streamlining video content consumption and reuse. In this work
column3: we present TVAN—temporal video analyzer—a system for temporal video analysis aimed at enabling efficient and robust video description and search. Its main components include: temporal video segmentation
column4: compact scene representation for efficient visual recognition
column5: and concise scene description generation. We provide a technical overview of the system
column6: as well as demonstrate its usefulness for the task of video search and navigation.
